content: Hi @Salman Shaik, what change would you like to make?

Tutorial.md is great.
Good starting point for beginners.

But there's just one line mentioning the module system.

I hoped I could add more to it.
Second guessing myself if I know enough to do that:sweat_smile:

Go for it :)
It will be reviewed by someone with the necessary background so it's all good.
Are you familiar with the github fork and PR workflow?

Anton said:

Go for it :)
It will be reviewed by someone with the necessary background so it's all good.
Are you familiar with the github fork and PR workflow?

Great.
Apologies for not responding, was fiddling with setting up Github. Never used it before.
I have raised a PR now. Hope the changes I made are coherent.

Thanks Anton.
Salman Shaik has marked this topic as resolved.
